  • Field Details

    • productSystemId

      public long productSystemId

    • aggregationType

      public AggregationType aggregationType

    • ceiling

      public boolean ceiling
      Indicates whether values should be rounded in `ceiling` mode (e.g. 2.1 is rounded to 3 in this case). If this field is set to false, normal `half-up` rounding is used.

    • naHandling

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static DQCalculationSetup of​(ProductSystem system)
      Initializes the setup with default settings. The data quality systems are initialized with the respective values from the reference process of the system (which may be null).
